channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-simple-string-first-arg (0.2)
item.description: This Flake8 plugin for checking that first param of callable is simple string.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-complicated-walrus (2.1)
item.description: This Flake8 plugin for checking complicated assignment expressions.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pydantic (0.3.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to check Pydantic related code.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-async (24.6.1)
item.description: A highly opinionated flake8 plugin for Trio-related problems.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: wemake-python-styleguide (0.19.2)
item.description: The strictest and most opinionated python linter ever
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flufl-flake8 (0.10)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for GNU Mailman import order
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: autohooks-plugin-flake8 (23.10)
item.description: An autohooks plugin for python code linting via flake8.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-isolated-packages (2.3)
item.description: This Flake8 plugin is for checking imports isolations.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-match (1.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin which forbids match statements (PEP 634)
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-logging-arg-count (0.3)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for detecting logging statements with mismatched argument counts
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-ruff (0.3)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin that implements miscellaneous checks from Ruff.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-cohesion (1.0.1)
item.description: A flake8 extension for measuring Python class cohesion.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-qchecker (1a1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for qChecker
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-errmsg (0.5)
item.description: Flake8 checker for raw literals inside raises.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-import-relative-two (0.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin that checks for relative imports up to a maximum of level two
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-vedro-allure (1)
item.description: flake8 based linter for vedro framework with integrated allure
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-qt-tr (0.2)
item.description: Flake8 extension for detecting incorrect QT translation
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-allowlist-imports (0.1.2)
item.description: flake8 plugin to allowlist imports
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-vcs-ext (2.0.2)
item.description: Плагин flake8 с проверкой на дополнительные стандарты кода, принятые на проекте VCS
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-obey-import-goat (0.1.1)
item.description: An extension for flake8 that forbids some imports statements in some modules.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-assert-check (0.1.1)
item.description: Plugin for flake8 that checks for asserts in tests.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-numba (0.4)
item.description: Perform checks over numba usage
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-one-letter-variables-check (0.0.2)
item.description: flake8 plugin for checking out one-letter variables
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-env-patterns (0.2.2)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks environment variable access against allowed patterns
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-numbers (0.1)
item.description: Flake8 Numbers Plugin
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-assert-finder (1)
item.description: A simple flake8 Plugin that checks if assert is used
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-vedro (1.0.1)
item.description: flake8 based linter for vedro framework
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-qa-style (1)
item.description: flake8 based linter for e2e tests
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-num-positionl-args (0.0.2)
item.description: flake8 plugin for check num of positional args.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-custom-import-rules (1.1.4)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin that enforces custom import rules, allowing users to define and maintain clean and consistent import organization across their Python projects.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-no-nested-comprehensions (1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to disallow nested comprehensions
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-cgx (0.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for cgx (Collagraph single file component) files
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-airflow (0.1.2)
item.description: Flake8 extension for Apache Airflow static analysis rules.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)
